00001 <?php
00002 /* $ComixWall: setup.inc,v 1.5 2009/11/25 23:47:27 soner Exp $ */
00003 
00004 /* DEFAULT USER CONFIGURATION STARTS HERE */
00005 
00006 /* rrdtool_path :   path to rrdtool executable
00007  * cache_dir :      where generated graphs (and their definitions) are
00008  *                  stored. garbage collection, ie file removal will happen
00009  *                  automatically; this directory cannot be shared with other
00010  *                  files.
00011  * cache_duration : number of seconds until files are refreshed
00012  * combine :        combine all 'type' rrdfiles for a host in one graph
00013  * host_tree :      where is the host tree located symon expects
00014  *                  a <host>/<rrds> directory structure.
00015  * isolate_hosts :  show a single host only when the default layout is selected
00016  * layout_dir :     location of layout files - remove this value to
00017  *                  disable user layouts
00018  *
00019  */
00020 
00021 /* running OpenBSD, apache chrooted:
00022 $symon['rrdtool_path']='/bin/rrdtool';
00023 $symon['cache_dir']='/symon/cache';
00024 $symon['host_tree']='/symon/rrds';
00025 $symon['layout_dir']='/symon';
00026 */
00027 
00028 /* running OpenBSD, apache not chrooted:*/
00029 $symon['rrdtool_path']='/usr/local/bin/rrdtool';
00030 /*$symon['cache_dir']='/var/www/symon/cache';
00031 $symon['host_tree']='/var/www/symon/rrds';
00032 $symon['layout_dir']='/var/www/symon';*/
00033 $SYMON_PATH= dirname(__FILE__);
00034 $symon['cache_dir']=$SYMON_PATH.'/cache';
00035 $symon['host_tree']=$SYMON_PATH.'/rrds';
00036 $symon['layout_dir']=$SYMON_PATH.'/layouts';
00037 //$symon['layout_dir']='';
00038 
00039 /* running FreeBSD, apache not chrooted: 
00040 $symon['rrdtool_path']='/usr/local/bin/rrdtool';
00041 $symon['cache_dir']='/usr/local/www/symon/cache';
00042 $symon['host_tree']='/usr/local/www/symon/rrds';
00043 $symon['layout_dir']='/usr/local/www/symon';
00044 */
00045 
00046 $symon['cache_duration']=20;
00047 $symon['isolate_hosts']=1;
00048 $symon['combine']['pfq']=1;
00049 $symon['combine']['io']=1;
00050 $symon['options']['df']='bytes';
00051 /* $symon['options']['df']='blocks'; */

00053 /* DEFAULT USER CONFIGURATION ENDS HERE */
